title: Hour 2 – Denny Hamlin (07-07-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 – Denny Hamlin (07-07-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they react to Eagles WR DeSean Jackson posting and apologizing for some anti-Semitic comments on social media. NASCAR driver Denny Hamlin joins the show to talk about racing during the pandemic and what he thought about President Trump’s tweet regarding Bubba Wallace. Doug also shares a conspiracy theory he has about the NBA playoffs in 2020.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
